<p>So I got things working (based on @user1671599 answer) and wanted to share it with you guys.</p>

<p>(I hope I'm doing it right since it's my first app in Python)</p>

<p>I did this -</p>

<p>Project structure:</p>

<p><img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/IFCX8.png" alt="enter image description here"></p>

<p>server.py:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> server.AppStarter <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> AppStarter
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> os

static_folder_root = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), <span class="hljs-string">"client"</span>)

app = AppStarter()
app.register_routes_to_resources(static_folder_root)
app.run(__name__)
</code></pre>

<p>AppStarter.py:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> flask <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Flask, send_from_directory
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> flask_restful <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Api, Resource
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> server.ApiResources.TodoList <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> TodoList
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> server.ApiResources.Todo <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Todo


<span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">AppStarter</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_ inherited__">Resource</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">__init__</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self</span>):
        self._static_files_root_folder_path = <span class="hljs-string">''</span>  <span class="hljs-comment"># Default is current folder</span>
        self._app = Flask(__name__)  <span class="hljs-comment"># , static_folder='client', static_url_path='')</span>
        self._api = Api(self._app)

    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">_register_static_server</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, static_files_root_folder_path</span>):
        self._static_files_root_folder_path = static_files_root_folder_path
        self._app.add_url_rule(<span class="hljs-string">'/&lt;path:file_relative_path_to_root&gt;'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'serve_page'</span>, self._serve_page, methods=[<span class="hljs-string">'GET'</span>])
        self._app.add_url_rule(<span class="hljs-string">'/'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'index'</span>, self._goto_index, methods=[<span class="hljs-string">'GET'</span>])

    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">register_routes_to_resources</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, static_files_root_folder_path</span>):

        self._register_static_server(static_files_root_folder_path)
        self._api.add_resource(TodoList, <span class="hljs-string">'/todos'</span>)
        self._api.add_resource(Todo, <span class="hljs-string">'/todos/&lt;todo_id&gt;'</span>)

    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">_goto_index</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self</span>):
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> self._serve_page(<span class="hljs-string">"index.html"</span>)

    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">_serve_page</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, file_relative_path_to_root</span>):
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> send_from_directory(self._static_files_root_folder_path, file_relative_path_to_root)

    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">run</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, module_name</span>):
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> module_name == <span class="hljs-string">'__main__'</span>:
            self._app.run(debug=<span class="hljs-literal">True</span>)
</code></pre>

<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;By default, flask use a "templates" folder to contain all your template files(any plain-text file, but usually <code>.html</code> or some kind of template language such as jinja2 ) &amp; a "static" folder to contain all your static files(i.e. <code>.js</code> <code>.css</code> and your images). <br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In your <code>routes</code>, u can use <code>render_template()</code> to render a template file (as I say above, by default it is placed in the <code>templates</code> folder) as the response for your request. And in the template file (it's usually a .html-like file), u may use some <code>.js</code> and/or `.css' files, so I guess your question is how u link these static files to the current template file. <br></p>

<p>In the static directory, create templates directory inside that directory add all the html file create separate directory for css and javascript as flask will treat or recognize all the html files which are inside the template directory.</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">static -
       |_ templates
       |_ css
       |_javascript
       |_images
</code></pre>

<p>This is what worked for me:</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> os
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> flask <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Flask, render_template, send_from_directory
app = Flask(__name__)


root = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), <span class="hljs-string">"whereyourfilesare"</span>)

<span class="hljs-meta">@app.route(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-string">'/'</span>, methods=[<span class="hljs-string">'GET'</span>]</span>)</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">main</span>(<span class="hljs-params">request</span>):
    path = request.path
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (path == <span class="hljs-string">'/'</span>):
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> send_from_directory(root, <span class="hljs-string">'index.html'</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> send_from_directory(root, path[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:])
</code></pre>
